required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Standardized Criteria to Judge Diagnostic Urethrocystoscopy Skills
clinical_study.official_title: Standardized Criteria to Judge Diagnostic Urethrocystoscopy Skills

brief_summary.textblock:
Develop a tool to objectively quantify technical skills necessary to perform diagnostic cystoscopy (using Objective Structured Assessment of Technical Skills- OSATS).
Develop criteria by which surgeons skills in diagnostic cystoscopy can be evaluated or judged.
Develop an intervention (1.5 hour workshop) which can be replicated by other residency programs in order to enhance learning of diagnostic cystoscopy. The workshop should be adequate for practicing Gynecologists as well as they already have experience with diagnostic hysteroscopy which uses many of the same concepts.

detailed_description.textblock: The OSATS and a written examination will be used to assess residents skills and knowledge pertinent to diagnostic urethrocystoscopy. All residents will be tested on anatomic replica of human bladder for baseline competency using the above tools. Then approximately half will be randomly selected to undergo an educational intervention (a workshop teaching diagnostic urethrocystoscopy). As we are interested in short-term acquisition, about a week later all residents will be retested using the same methods. Grades on the exam will be kept confidential.

primary_outcome.measure: measure competency and change in urethrocystoscopy skills

secondary_outcome.measure: Establish validity and reliability of measurement tools (OSATS) used to evaluate urethrocystoscopy skills

arm_group.description: The intervention group will view a 20 minute video, receive a 30 minute didactic lecture on urethrocystoscopy, and 30 minute coaching/practice performing diagnostic cystoscopy on anatomic replicas of the human bladder.
The control group will be instructed to read a urethrocystoscopy textbook chapter at home

intervention.description: The intervention group will view a 20 minute video, receive a 30 minute didactic lecture on urethrocystoscopy, and 30 minute coaching/practice performing diagnostic cystoscopy on anatomic replicas.
intervention.other_name: Objective structured assessment of surgical skills (OSATS), diagnostic cystoscopy,
urethrocystoscopy skills intervention, objective evaluation of procedure skills intervention,
educational workshops, cystoscopy classes, cystoscopy certificate

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All Obstetrics & Gynecology and Urology resident physicians training at the University of Cincinnati
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any above resident with extensive training in cystoscopy

reference.citation: Siddighi S, Kleeman SD, Baggish MS, Rooney CM, Pauls RN, Karram MM. Effects of an educational workshop on performance of fourth-degree perineal laceration repair. Obstet Gynecol. 2007 Feb;109(2 Pt 1):289-94.

clinical_study.keyword: objective structured assessment of surgical skills (OSATS)
